function is_prime(n) result(res)
  integer, intent(in) :: n
  logical :: res
  integer :: i, max_i
  if (n <= 1) then
    res = .false. return
  elseif (n == 2) then
    res = .true.
    return
  elseif (mod(n,2) == 0) then
    res = .false. return
  end if
  max_i = int(sqrt(real(n))) + 1
  do i = 3, max_i, 2
    if (mod(n,i) == 0) then
      res = .false. return
    end if
  end do
  res = .true.
end function

program main
  implicit none
  integer :: x, i, found
  real(kind=8) :: sqrt_x, input, ratio, countOdd
  logical :: is_prime

  ! Read input
  read(*,*) x

  ! First part: find the next prime
  if (x /= 2 .and. mod(x,2) == 0) then
     x = x +1
  end if

  do while (true)

     found = .false.

           exit

     end do
     if (.not. found) then
        exit
     else
        x = x +2
     end if
  end do

  ! Second part: compute ratio
  input = real(x, kind=8)
  countOdd = nint(input / 2.0d0)
  ratio = countOdd / input

  ! Output with 10 decimal places
  write(*, '(F12.10)') ratio

end program main
